meta.name: Daily Motivational Quotes from ZenQuotes to Slack Channels

parameters.content:
‚≠ê **SETUP REQUIRED:**

1. **Connect Slack App:**
   - Create Slack app at api.slack.com
   - Add OAuth scopes: chat:write, channels:read
   - Install to workspace

2. **Configure Channel:**
   - Update channel in 'Send to Slack' node
   - Default: #general

3. **Timezone:**
   - Workflow set to America/New_York
   - Change in workflow settings if needed

‚ú® Uses FREE ZenQuotes.io API - no key needed!
